put.summary: Imports forward and settle/historical curve prices into nTrack Pro.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: nTrack Index ID; NOTE: One of Either INDEX ID or ETRM_ID is required; If BOTH are provided, the nTrack INDEX ID will take precedence

parameters.name: senderETRMId
parameters.description: When provided, this will find the index based on the ETRM/Price Warehouse INDEX ID; NOTE: One of Either nTrack INDEXID or ETRM_ID is required

parameters.name: priceDate
parameters.description: The date of the price being sent. NOTE: The procedure will determine from the index definition whether the price will be stored on the daily or month-end basis. If it is the last day of the month, and the index is daily, it will also update the monthly price table

parameters.name: closeRate
parameters.description: This is the closing rate as of the date provided

parameters.name: priceDataSource
parameters.description: The name of the data feed from which the price is coming.

parameters.name: publishedRateHigh
parameters.description: The High for the date provided

parameters.name: publishedRateLow
parameters.description: The Low for the data provided

parameters.name: publishedRateAverage
parameters.description: The Average for the data provided

parameters.name: publishedMTD
parameters.description: If not provided, nTrack will calculate the Month To Date average

parameters.name: updatedBy
parameters.description: The person (or system) sending the data. If not provided, the system user name will be derived.

parameters.description: Dates range applicability: 1 = "Tier start and end date range", 2 = "Tier creation date range", 3 = "Tier Create/Update/Delete data range"

parameters.name: endUserAccountNumber
parameters.description: End user account number with LDC (Optional)

parameters.name: ldcNameLike

put.summary: Saves price agreement tier integration return status and message at the tier level in nTrack Pro.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Required: Either 1 for "Accepted" or 0 for "Rejected"; This indicates if the price agreement tier is successfully saved in the target system or not

parameters.name: senderETRMName
parameters.description: Name of the sender ETRM/Connected Application; Recommended to send the system which is sending the confirmation. e.g., "Endur", "Allegro", "SAP, "EKA", etc.

parameters.name: senderETRMId
parameters.description: Required: Id of the sender ETRM; The ETRM ID number for which the confirmation is being sent. This allows nTrack to map back to the ETRM system if needed

parameters.name: senderETRMItemId
parameters.description: Required: Id of the sender ETRM Item Id; The ETRM ITEM ID number for which the confirmation is being sent. This allows nTrack to map back to the ETRM system if needed

201.description: No content on success only status code

Nom_Pipe_Charge_Ppa.description: The Nomination Pipe Charge PPA class

defaultEdiPointOfView.description: The Default Edi Point Of View
The Default Edi Point Of View

PipelineChargeDefDataModel.description: The Pipeline Charge Def Data Model

pipelineContractReleaseChargeId.description: The Pipeline Contract Release Charge Id

PipelineContractReleaseChargeModel.description: The Pipeline Contract Release Charge Model

pipelineLocationSubGroupId.description: The Pipeline Location Sub Group Id
The Pipeline Location Sub Group Id

pipelineLocationStorageBalanceId.description: The Pipeline Location Storage Balance Id

pipelinePtToPtRateMatrixId.description: The Pipeline Pt To Pt Rate Matrix Id

pipelineRateScheduleChargesId.description: The Pipeline Rate Schedule Charges Id

isEnforcePointLevelMdq.description: The Is Enforce Point Level Mdq

pipelineTransContractTypeId.description: The Pipeline Trans Contract Type Id

pipelineLocationIdRecVal.description: The Pipeline Location Id Rec Val

pipelineLocationIdDelVal.description: The Pipeline Location Id Del Val

pipelineZoneRateMatrixId.description: The Pipeline Zone Rate Matrix Id

marketTierID.description: Unique number from nTrack to identify the deal in EKA.

tierCreationDate.description: The date the tier wsa originally created

buySell.description: nTrack does not have a Buy/Sell indicator in the price agreemetns. API to send "Buy" if the volume is a positive value and "Sell" if it is a negative value.

startDate.description: Price agreement start date in nTrack

endDate.description: Price agreement end date in nTrack

pipeline.description: No need to send this field to EKA, it is derived from location relationship

locationName.description: The full name of the LDC

serviceType.description: Currently all deals entered in EKA are set to "Firm" service type and middleware to set this to "Firm" and ignore the value sent by nTrack.

volume.description: Always a positive float/double number. If a new tier is created with a zero volume then do not send it. However, if volume is changed from a number to zero then send it so that volume can be updated in EKA

priceUnit.description: Currently all deals are priced in USD in nTrack

volumeUOM.description: Currently all volumes are entered in MMBTU

priceType.description: Fixed, Index and Complex are the possible values

fixedPrice.description: Send price if the PriceType is Fixed price otherwise NULL

indexName.description: Send Index name if the pricetype is index otherwise NULL

basis.description: Send Basis only if the price type is Index

tierPercent.description: Send index percent only if price type is Index

priceDescription.description:
nTrack to send price description in this field and it will be saved in EKA comments. 
Each revision to the deal in EKA should store the price description with date and time stamp. 
This will be used as audit history in EKA to see what was changed on the deals over a period of time.

sourceName.description: nTrack to send "nTrack Pro" in the SourceSystem field

priceFormula.description: nTrack will build a price formula based on how the tier is configured. I.e."NGI_CHI_CityGate - NYM) + 2.20"

etrmPriceType.description: ETRM Price Type - formula or Index
